comment: Lemma for ~ binomcxp . The sum in ~ binomcxplemnn0 and its derivative (see the next theorem, ~ binomcxplemdvsum ) converge, as long as their base ` J ` is within the disk of convergence. Part of remark "This convergence allows us to apply term-by-term differentiation..." in the Wikibooks proof. (Contributed by Steve Rodriguez, 22-Apr-2020.)
